actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain organizations from private foundation status.

summary.text: Exempts from private foundation status under the Internal Revenue Code fraternal benefit societies, orders, associations, and domestic fraternal societies, orders, or associations, operating under the lodge system which were incorporated before June 1, 1939.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain organizations from private foundation status.
